participant_1.name: John
participant_1.personality: Friendly and social, enjoys sports and cooking.
participant_1.background: I like basketball. I work many hours. My favorite band is Imagine Dragons. I'm from Texas.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Intellectual and creative, with a passion for cooking and literature.
participant_2.background: As a child, I won a national spelling bee. I have perfect pitch. I have a severe phobia of wide open spaces. I have been published in the New Yorker magazine. I am a gourmet cook.

content.text: Hi, my name is John. What's your name?
Hello, my name is Sarah. It's nice to meet you.
You too, Sarah. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, cook, and play basketball.
Basketball, huh? That's cool. I love to play basketball too. Where are you from?
I'm from New York City. What about you?
I'm from Texas.
Oh, cool. Have you ever been to New York City?
No, I haven't. I've always wanted to go though.
You should definitely come visit sometime. There's so much to see and do here.
I will definitely keep that in mind. What do you like to read?
I love to read anything, but I really enjoy historical fiction and romance novels.
Oh, cool. I love historical fiction too. What's your favorite book?
It's hard to say, but I think my favorite book is "The Help" by Kathryn Stockett.
I've heard good things about that book. I'll have to check it out.
You should. It's a really great book.
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a gourmet cook.
That's awesome! I'm a big fan of cooking. What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love to cook anything, but I'm especially good at making pasta.
I love pasta too! I'll have to come over for dinner sometime.
You're welcome to anytime
